SELECT cd code, cd_korn_nm "value", cd id, cd_korn_nm text, up_cd, cd_group_sn, up_cd FROM TCM_INTG_CD
WHERE 1=1
AND cd_group_sn = #{cdGroupSn}
AND cd = #{schCd}
AND up_cd IS NULL
AND NVL(up_cd,'') = NVL(#{upCd},'') AND NVL(use_yn,'Y') = 'Y' AND del_yn = 'N'
ORDER BY cd_seq

WITH code_tree AS ( SELECT ic.cd FROM FTCORE.tcm_intg_cd ic WHERE ic.cd_group_sn = 16 AND ic.use_yn = 'Y' AND ic.del_yn = 'N' START WITH ic.cd =#{schUpNtnCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR ic.cd = ic.up_cd ) SELECT DISTINCT nc.ntn_no code, nc.ntn_nm text, nc.ntn_eng_nm, nc.ntn_cd, nc.cntnt_cd FROM FTCORE.tcm_ntn_cd nc JOIN code_tree ct ON nc.cntnt_cd = ct.cd WHERE nc.use_yn = 'Y' AND nc.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY nc.cntnt_cd, nc.ntn_nm;

WITH RECURSIVE fld_tree AS ( SELECT cd_ver_sn, oda_fld_cd, up_oda_fld_cd, fld_cd_nm, 1 AS node_level, -- level → node_level 로 변경 CAST(oda_fld_cd AS VARCHAR(1000)) AS path FROM FTCORE.tcm_biz_fld_cd WHERE cd_ver_sn = 1 AND (up_oda_fld_cd IS NULL OR up_oda_fld_cd = '-' OR up_oda_fld_cd = '')
UNION ALL
SELECT c.cd_ver_sn, c.oda_fld_cd, c.up_oda_fld_cd, c.fld_cd_nm, p.node_level + 1 AS node_level, CONCAT(p.path, ' > ', c.oda_fld_cd) FROM FTCORE.tcm_biz_fld_cd c JOIN fld_tree p ON c.cd_ver_sn = p.cd_ver_sn AND c.up_oda_fld_cd = p.oda_fld_cd ) SELECT * FROM fld_tree ORDER BY path

SELECT oda_fld_cd code, fld_cd_nm "value", fld_cd_nm text, up_oda_fld_cd up_cd FROM tcm_biz_fld_cd
WHERE 1=1
AND NVL(up_oda_fld_cd,'') = NVL( #{upCd},'')
ORDER BY oda_fld_cd
